alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 6:29PM CDT until July 10 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of North Platte, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Platte, North Platte Airport, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, Keith and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 10. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 171 and 189. Highway 83 between mile markers 75 and 100. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
